embeds.description:
Thank you for reporting an issue in **{server_name}**. Our moderation team will review your report as soon as possible.

Ticket: {ticket_channel}

Please provide the following information:
- Username of the member being reported
- What happened (with screenshots if possible)
- When it happened (date/time)
